title: SAMSUNG 55 cm (22 inch) Full HD LED TV  (22F5100-a)

product_specification.In The Box:
Normal Button Remote
Power Cable
User Manual
Batteries (For Remote Control)
TV Unit
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MKV, AVI, ASF, PS, TS, 3GGP, Flash Formats
product_specification.Other Video Features:
Wide Color Enhancer Plus
Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio
Film Mode
product_specification.Sound Technology: Dolby Pulse, DTS Premium Sound, DTS Studio Sound, Dolby Digital Plus
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, ADPCM, WMA, HE-AAC, MPEG, AAC
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Auto Channel Search, Sports Mode, Allows USB to USB Data Transfer
product_specification.Covered in Warranty:
Defect arising out of Faulty or defective material or workmanship
Parts & Labour cost is covered
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Defects caused by improper use as determined by the company personnel
Modification or alteration of any nature is made in the electrical circuitry or physical construction of the set
The warranty card and the invoice are not presented to authorized to personnel at the time of repair
Original serial number is removed, obliterated or altered from the machine or cabinet
Site (premises where the product is kept) conditions that do not confirm to the recommended operating conditions of the machine
Product is not used according to instructions given in the instruction manual
Installation/repair work is carried out by persons / agency other than authorized by the company
Defects due to cause beyond control like lightning, abnormal voltage, acts of god or while in transit to service centre or purchaser's residence.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.

product_description.Connectivity: Designed with Samsung's ConnectShare feature, you can connect up to 2 USB drives or external hard disks to your TV via the USB port so as to view all the digital content on it, such as, movies, videos, photos and more. The TV also comes with a HDMI port that lets you stream videos seamlessly.
product_description.Display: The direct LED display is combined with Full HD technology to render images at a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, while the Wide Colour Enhancer Plus technology greatly refines picture quality. The Clean View feature enables this 55 cm (22") TV to exhibit extraordinary picture clarity.

review:
If you are under 15k budget, you want HD quality screen.. this is it (its Full HD).
Screen looks like a computer LCD monitor pitch dark black, very good quality material, feels premium, remote is Samsung standard remote, screen brightness is pretty good, you can control back light very easily also it has eco mode, where you can dim and also switch off screen if you want to listen just to audio (say news, music channel) .. it plays huge files without glitch, tested couple of mkv & mp4 container files having h.264 codec with 1080p resolution with mp4 AAC audio, it works.. have not tested all the file format.. I guess it should work most of them.. I also tested opening up my dslr photos which was 12-14MB file, it plays slideshow with out a glitch.. people who are bothered about the sound, I was happy with the output volume though 3Wx2 it is not that bad for the size. (It has two USB one with 1Amp and another with 0.5Amp) USB to USB copy works fine with Fat32 format, it failed for me to paste the file on NTFS HDD, nevertheless it reads my 1TB NTFS based HDD.
Will try to update when I use it more.

Thanks

It's the cheapest of the prestigious "5-Series Samsung LED TVs" and performs like one too. Despite the fact that there's no VGA input point ( just buy a VGA-HDMI converter, just 100 bucks ) this TV/monitor is definitely in my good books.

For TV viewers, get an HD connection to experience the full feel of Full HD. They say you can't feel the difference in a 22 inch screen, but trust me, it makes a lot of difference if you are planning to watch at close range, like you would for a PC screen.

I haven't connected it with PC yet, but seen the clarity of HD ready, Full HD and UHD video performance via USB and its just eye candy. Its quite a TV at this prize range.

Enthusiasts shall go through the Samsung website and search for this particular product for all the details you want to know.

I'm a big time lover of technology and I highly recommend it.

Full HD hence you can have excellent clarity when connected to HD reception. Sound is good. Overall Value for Money ( VFM).

FlipKart service -- too good - got the product next day - installation and all within 30 min.

For small room size it have better viewing angle,
COLOUR DEPTH : 5/5
CLARITY : 3/5 , CLEAR MOTION : 5/5
SOUND : 3/5
LOOK 5/5
SIDE VIEWING ANGLE: 4/5
FUNCTIONS : 5/5 , USB to USB copying is fast. the one of the best quality is that is picture,
all non-HD channels seem to be HD through a distance. The operating system is easy to use and understand. The sound quality is not so much better .I hope you would be satisfied by buying this product.

Very good product with full hd display, can be used as monitor with audio output.
Doesn't have great viewing angles, however its the best for the price..
Ideal for bachelors, go for it....

I placed order on 17th July, the TV was delivered on the morning of 20th July and it was installed by Flipkart technician on the same day afternoon. Tremendous service. Regarding the TV it performs very well. I have place in my 10 x 14 hall. The display is
good. Sound is nice. By pressing media in the remote I am able to play the video songs in the USB. I have not yet tested HDMI. I am fully satisfied with this item. Setting Colour, brightness etc. are very easy. We can use angle settings to watch the TV in standing position or sitting lower than the TV or above. It is nice in all.
Nice one. Clear display. USB support is good. Audio quality average. Overall good product at 10k range.

I bought this product from flipkart ..informed them that there is a volume issue and some small issue like mobile did not get connected to the TV.. ..I want to get a refund on it so I buy a new one(big TV) for better quality of sound .. All flipkart did is sending a request to Samsung ... Samsung guy came to my house ..checked TV and said I won't refund the tv as he refused to accept the truth that volume is low ...finally no option left ...flipkart is redirecting me to Samsung ...and Samsung is redirecting me to flipkart ... At last 1 thing is for sure ... I am not going to buy any electronic things online

I recommend this LED FULL HD TV for any one looking for a TV within 20 K.
Always go for FULL HD TV..for best experience.

I ordered this TV on Nov 9 and it was delivered on Nov 21 as per the agreement. Many people are complaining about the viewing angle. I faced the same problem too. This TV is equipped with Magic Angle. It can be found inside Picture settings. Setting it to Lean Back Mode with a value of 7 to 9 gives me a better viewing angle. I watch lot of movies lying down on my bed and the magic angle helps.
I follow this and I get a better viewing angle every time.
1) When I am sitting down and watching TV, I switch off Magic Angle or use the standard mode in it
2) When watching TV lying down, I use Lean back mode with a value of 7 to 9
It makes a huge difference.
I have connected the TV to my Creative Roar BT speaker. The sound quality for the movies is awesome this way.
I also use my TV with Tata Sky HD. With HD channels the picture and TV sound quality is awesome. You should watch HD movies with DTS TS turned on. I max out the volume in my Tata sky and control the output with Samsung remote. This TV also has a manual EQ mode which helps with overall sound quality.

The USB ports work perfectly. I have attached a USB Hub with Memory card reader to it. I watch lots of movies through my SD card and every quality from 360p to 1080p play flawlessly. Glad that this TV supports multiple video and audio formats.

The reason for four stars is because of the manual adjustment I have to do every time to suit my viewing angle. I also own a LG 22 Inch LED which has IPS display. Unfortunately it has a much better viewing angle without any manual settings.

Overall really worth the 11,190 that I paid for this.

The shipping could have been a little faster. But the installation was done on time and the technician was very good. Thanks WS Retail and Flipkart.

This TV is meant only for those who are Tech Savvy and Tech Wizards and have a natural intuitive flair for anything tech related. I belong to this Category.I had been researching on this Particular Samsung Model UA22F5100 was the last 8 months and just on seeing the display on Flipkart I knew this is what I wanted and never felt the need to visit any physical showrooms to see the demo of this model. I would have ordered this in Jan-2015 itself but for some house-hold impediments[My Father & His thinking of clinging to all old things purchased for the 1st time himself]. Finally the impediments were solved by themselves.

I had a 23 year old [1992] Crown FS-2179 16 Channel CRT Color TV weighing over 20 Kgs which was working but was on it's last legs as the HT Transformer was making a shrieking noise since 20-08-2015. Hence decided to get rid of it and the best option was Samsung UA22F5100 22" LED TV on Flipkart with Exchange. Also the Seller was WS Retail hence had no qualms in ordering it. Got Rs 1150/- off for the Old Crown TV[After deducting Rs 50 pick charges from Rs 1200/-] Placed the order on 22-08-2015 @ 10:34 AM and Order was completed on 23-08-2015 @ 11:00 AM. Both Delivery of New Samsung LED TV [SSTV] and Pickup of Old CRT TV happened simultaneously as the Old TV was kept in pickup ready state and shown in working condition to the Pick Up Staff. All paperwork with purchaser ID Proof was done and over within 15 Minutes. Paid the Net COD. At 11:20 AM Received SMS From Flipkart that scheduled installation & demo was done with Samsung & would be completed in 2 Business Days. However Despite being a Sunday [23-08-2015] Samsung Service Technician Called @ 02:25 PM and Installed the TV in 10 Minutes before the Start of Rahu Kalam @ 4:30 PM. Such Professional Service can only be expected from Flipkart & Samsung.

Features:
The SSTV has two HDMI Ports HDMI-1 & HDMI-2. HDMI-1 is used to connect HDMI Cable from Dish TV HD Box. The SSTV does not come with HDMI cable in the box so before ordering locate & connect your HDMI Cable from the Dish TV Box or buy before hand and keep it ready. HDMI-2/DVI is used to connect PC/Laptop to the TV via DVI/VGA To HDMI Adapter. Again the adapter is not in the Box. If you connect the HDMI Cable from Dish TV Box to SSTV then all other SD channels + HD will also come via the same cable. You don't need different inputs for different formats or remote selection menu.

SS TV has 5 RCA Type[VCR Video Out Type] In Ports which is 3 Video Y[Yellow Green]-Pb-Pr and Two Audio L-R for Analogue video/audio signals from SD Set Top Boxes like Hathway and DEN ADN. The Analogue signals are also displayed much cleanly and better than in a CRT TV with just AV In Ports.

The SSTV has twin USB Ports with different power settings. 1 with 5V/0.5 Amps current Rating & Another with 5V/1 Amp Current. The lower current rating is for Pen Drives and Card Readers and the Higher current rating is for External USB 2.0/3.0 Portable Hard Disks. I put a Toshiba Canvio 1 Tb USB 3.0 HDD and it was detected and all files and folders were opened and Video & Audio Files & Images could be played and seen. Same with a Kingston 8 Gb Data Traveller USB 3.0 Flash Drive. However if you have a flash drive which is Connected & stored with Dish TV Box Videos then it is not detected on the TV.

It has a external head ear phone socket meant only for headphones where the output volume is low. The internal speaker cuts off when head phone is put. The dolby sound quality is excellent in all modes like Standard, Movie, Sports, Dynamic. The SS features audio/video cleaning and voice filtering circuits for both picture and sound. However if you connect an external speaker to headphone port then all Dolby Sound Effect is nullified and analogue sound only comes. A Word of Caution here. Don't put the pin and remove it multiple times or else the headphone pin can become loose and then sound will not come on the SS TV speakers. Use a Extension cable with stereo pin to TV fixed permanently and socket on the other end.

Picture Quality via Dish TV HD Box is amazing, same with Sound Quality Also. Don't think twice before buying this SS LED UA22F5100 on Flipkart especially under exchange for your old Dinosaur CRT TV over 20" in rooms of 12' x 12'. You can't a better deal as of now or in the future. Order Right Away before stocks or exchange scheme ends.

i ordered this tv on 15th june 2015 and was delivered on 16th june 21015 so flipkart service at its best once again for me...it was well packed and delivery guys were good n cheerful.
And flipkart arranged my installation trough samsung technician within 6 hours of delivery..excellent service i must say by both flipkart and samsung team.
Now coming to the tv..well i had searched all tv companies of there 22inch and 24 inch models in all e-commerce sites as well as brick n mottar stores.
And was tempted by some of VU company models and AOC models too, as for AOC its a equally good and reputed company and there service and products are very good too as my brother uses one of there tv, and for VU well its new company to me and no much feedback i could get either from web or retail stores, so VU was out from my list.
Samsung had been my first choice in electronic products as there service is awesome and products are reliable too, and as far as tv is concerned i liked samsung the best as there picture quality is unmatched by any company be it sony LG philips etc...
But samsung products price were on higher side in each category then its competitors( primaryly for there quality i guess)...
So i decided to give it a try and see if i am lucky to get there tv within my budget, and to my luck i got this model within my budget with all features i wanted and even more features dn i expected.
its full hd tv with 2 hdmi n 2 usb ports exactly what i wanted, plus samsung 22inch means 22inch+ as its almost 56cm tv rather then 55cm it should be(checked on net and also verfied myself too).
So, finally ordered the tv and was extremly happy as got my favorite tv brand with all features i wanted, and that too within my price budget :) ...
Now as for real performance is concerned, i have used the tv extensivly for past 24hours and here are my points i found out:
The picture quality is superb and crystal clear with right brightness and contrast ratio too.
Even tough i am using a SD cabel connection the picture clearity is superb and colours are vivd even better then the sony 32inch tv i have in the hall.
The sound quality is really really good and clear and very loud too as i am using in my bedroom of size 15feet by 14feet ( till now i have used only volume level upto 50 out of 100 for some enhlish channel only while for hindi channel like sony colours life ok etc i have used till 38 only out of 100) as the sound is very loud which is an added bonous point for me as never thought could get a tv with such nice clear and loud sound.
i watch the tv from a distance within 10feet and its very clear from this distance, as i can clearly read each and every letter in the news channel which is very good for me as my last tv which was CRT model i could not do so.
when watching movies or soaps the picture comes very very clearly and vividly, and even my wife is happy by the performance of this product too :) ...
i connected my laptop using HDMI cabel i got from flipkart too to this tv and display was superb ...played latest tomb raider game at full HD, mind blowing realistic it looked...
So my final verdict is if u want a tv to watch within 10 to 12 feet of distance expecting to have a veryy clear picture and good readability of words too and crystal clear loud sound within RS15000 then this should be the one as its from a big brand company with great after sales service record till now...
Only one regret is that the tv cost in flipkart Rs11990 which higer then Snapdeal price which is selling this tv for R11500, but snapdeal was taking 10days time to deliver while flipkart took 1 day only so guess its worth it...

I bought this product for my single use. Almost in the same price range Micromax was offering 32 inch LED. To be honest I was tempted to purchase a 32inch by paying Rs2000 extra, but I stuck to Samsung. Now coming to the review of this LED.

What is good? So when we are going to purchase an LED TV, we primarily look out for 2 things- Picture Clarity & Size.
If you are looking for an LED TV for a small room, then this is the product you are looking for. It is, perhaps, not idle for a bigger hall.

The picture clarity of this Full HD LED is very very good. Even normal channels look very good. HD Channels will blow our mind for this price range.

What is not so good?

The sound speaker is not so good. It is just below average. When you are watching an HD Channel, you would like to have better sound system. A good speaker system would be useful though. Moreover, almost every LED TV has average to normal sound out put. You need external speakers for better sound.
Finally, Best for Bachelors, small rooms. Go for it
